TopicTitle: This is my best moment in my life.

Articles.Content:
Edgy old me fooled my teacher with edgy statistics!

Edited October 25, 2015 by musicpenguin
Haha, nice job. I like certain types of country, but the stuff on the Radio gets too repetitive.
Yeah, I really don't like country. I'm fine with a little of it but not much.

Ok. So I have this teacher I don't like very much. She loves country. She was playing in our class during a test. I hate country. I whipped out my laptop and got a study about how the more airtime country gets the higher the suicide rate is. I handed her the laptop and told her to read it and turned off the radio. She turned it off with a priceless look on her face. Awesome.

Your teacher just got owned.
Is there an actual causal link between country and suicide or is it coincidence?
Modern country (the stuff on the radio) is just pop with twang. Scratch that music on the radio is just pop.
It's a actual link. I'll show you the report in a second. this is only one small part but here. HERE
